name: Donald FOX and Kay Fox, his wife v. VOLKSWAGEN OF AMERICA, INC., YBH Porsche Audi and the Fidelity Bank. Appeal of the FIDELITY BANK
name_abbreviation: Fox v. Volkswagen of America, Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Donald FOX and Kay Fox, his wife v. VOLKSWAGEN OF AMERICA, INC., YBH Porsche Audi and the Fidelity Bank. Appeal of the FIDELITY BANK.

casebody.head_matter:
490 A.2d 438
Donald FOX and Kay Fox, his wife v. VOLKSWAGEN OF AMERICA, INC., YBH Porsche Audi and the Fidelity Bank. Appeal of the FIDELITY BANK.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 16, 1985.
Decided April 23, 1985.

Stanley P. Stahl, Stephen S. Phillips, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
